Literature.Title: Tuning the antimicrobial pharmacophore to enable discovery of short lipopeptides with multiple modes of action.
Literature.Author: Fang Y, Zhong W, Wang Y, Xun T, Lin D, Liu W, Wang J, Lv L, Liu S, He J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=62.5 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:18% Hemolysis=125 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:35% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=7.8-15.6µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=15.6-31.2µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 14053(MIC=15.6-31.2µg/ml)
